attributes.review: So I downloaded this app in attempt to listen to trump and not what he calls “fake news” but the app told me the same things but they were OKAY THINGS TO DO???? It promoted predatory behaviour, racism, sexism and homophobia I am not oaky with that being said. So obviously I deleted the app because that is disgusting. I would never recommend to ANYONE not even my homophobic grandpa. But before I deleted the app it started showing me pictures of an orange and telling me to vote for it obviously I cannot vote for a orange that would be absurd. All the app is is constant pictures of oranges and a Cheeto man saying weird things. Not a fun app👎👎👎👎
attributes.title: KACHIGGA

attributes.review: It keeps on giving me notification with wrong information. It is making my phone heat up AND it made my battery drop 20% AS SOON as I went into the app. Wouldn’t recommend this app to my worst enemies honestly.
attributes.title: This app is honestly terrible

attributes.review: The app is CONSTANTLY crashing, up to the point where I can barely be on the application for more than a few minutes before it crashing. On top of this, the layout is less-than-intuitive, and it’s extremely easy to accidentally click on something and then not find how to go back or exit. The app will ask you for your location AND cellphone number, but DON’T PROVIDE THIS INFO! You’ll be pestered constantly via text through different numbers, up to the point where it’s almost impossible to block them all or stop them from texting you once they have your phone number. Considering the candidate’s target audience is older, the lack of accessibility and it’s constant pestering to share the app with your contact list is malicious and upsetting. DON’T WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS APPLICATION. I AM PRETTY SURE IT’LL JUST STORE ANY INFO YOU GIVE TO IT, SO PLEASE PROTECT YOURSELVES.
attributes.title: Glitchy, Malicious & Annoying

attributes.review:
This is my first time ever typing a bad review. This is such a bad app... every time I click something, a random ad just pops up! Whenever I try to play the game, it just becomes a black screen. You can’t play with a black screen... it’s just not it. I also heavily disagree with the title of the app — unless you meant “Trump 2020 ✨ on a gravestone 😻”. I hope you will listen to what I have to say and fix it. I also hope you will listen to the BLM movement and do something instead of tear gassing and shooting rubber bullets at people. Thanks. 
🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: My Complaints

attributes.review: As soon as i downloaded the app my phone started heating up so naturally i threw it in the pool but the phone was so hot it started to boil the pool while my sister was in it. My sister start to feel the boiling water so she tried to swim away but while she was swimming the phone got caught in her mouth and she swallowed it. The phone then exploded in her leaving a gaping hole in her chest. Then she went into cardiac arrest while doing kart wheels. 1/10 do not recommend.
attributes.title: no ❤️
